argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lspss.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lspss.n | |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LSubSp ` W ) = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 4 | 1, 3, 2 | #P_lspcl | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ U C_ V ) -> ( N ` U ) e. ( LSubSp ` W ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 2 | #P_lspid | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ ( N ` U ) e. ( LSubSp ` W ) ) -> ( N ` ( N ` U ) ) = ( N ` U ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ U C_ V ) -> ( N ` ( N ` U ) ) = ( N ` U ) ) |
